inscription:
Inscription

on back at top edge (on old mount tape), in pencil: [Gaetano Gandolfi]
medium: Black and white chalk on laid paper
provenance: Private collection, Rome. [Mia Weiner, New York, until 1981; sold, May 19, as by Ubaldo Gandolfi, for $1, 600, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1981-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Drapery Study of a Reclining Woman (recto); Study of a Leg (verso)
